trans-unit.source: Represents a service that provides properties and events to control the display and behavior of tooltips.
trans-unit.target: 속성 및 표시 및 도구 설명의 동작을 제어 하는 이벤트를 제공 하는 서비스를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: You define a tooltip for an element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 요소에 대 한 도구 설명을 설정 하 여 정의 된 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip property takes one child.

The content of the child can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that has embedded text and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> elements.
trans-unit.target: 자식 콘텐츠 변하는 간단한 텍스트 문자열에서 복잡 한 콘텐츠와 같은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>포함 된 텍스트 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>요소.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can define tooltip content as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, but this is not required.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명 콘텐츠를 정의할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>개체가 아니라이 필요 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: When you do not define the tooltip content as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, you can use the ToolTipService properties to position and customize the tooltip content.
trans-unit.target: 때 도구 설명으로 콘텐츠를 정의 하지 않으면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>개체를 배치 하 고 도구 설명 콘텐츠 ToolTipService 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTipService class attached properties are used to determine the placement, behavior, and appearance of a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: ToolTipService 연결 된 클래스 속성 배치, 동작 및 도구 설명의 모양을 결정 하는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: These properties are set on the element that defines the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 속성은 도구 설명을 정의 하는 요소에 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> class and the ToolTipService class share many of the same properties that are used to customize a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>클래스와 ToolTipService 클래스 대부분의 도구 설명 사용자 지정 하는 데 사용 되는 동일한 속성을 공유 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: If equivalent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> and ToolTipService properties are both set, the ToolTipService property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 해당 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>ToolTipService 속성이 모두 설정 하 고, ToolTipService 속성이 우선 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: For example, if both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip?displayProperty=fullName> object, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 두는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성에 대해 설정 된 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip?displayProperty=fullName>값, 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following ToolTipService timing properties are only defined for the ToolTipService class and are used by all tooltips: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.InitialShowDelay%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay%2A> For information about how to handle the events that occur when the tooltip opens or closes, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> fields.
trans-unit.target: 다음 ToolTipService 타이밍 속성 ToolTipService 클래스에 대해서만 정의 된 모든 도구 설명에서 사용 하 고:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.InitialShowDelay%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay%2A>도구 설명이 열리거나 닫힐 때 발생 하는 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 정보를 참조 하십시오.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent>필드.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.InitialShowDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset%2A> behave similarly to the properties of the same name in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.HorizontalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 에 동일한 이름의 속성 유사 하 게 작동</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset%2A> 하 고</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementRectangle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> 을이 이벤트를 수신 대기 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value to set.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*> attached property for an object.
trans-unit.target: 값을 설정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*>연결 된 개체에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*>

trans-unit.source: If the value is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> is used without any modification.
If the value is any other type, that value is used as the content for a tooltip that is provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>.
trans-unit.target: 다른 형식의 값은 경우 해당 값에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> 제공 되는 도구 설명에 대 한 내용으로 사용 됩니다.

Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowOnDisabled*> attached property.
To be added.

Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing> event that is exposed by objects that use the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"></xref> service to display tooltips.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>이벤트에 의해 노출 되는 사용 하는 개체는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"> </xref> 도구 설명을 표시 하려면 서비스.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing> event occurs immediately before a tooltip closes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>이벤트 도구 설명 닫기 바로 전에 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>

trans-unit.source: This field registers the behavior of the ToolTipClosingEvent event for classes that use this service.
trans-unit.target: 이 필드는이 서비스를 사용 하는 클래스에 대 한 ToolTipClosingEvent 이벤트의 동작을 등록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>클래스는 둘 다 구현는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>를 통해이 이벤트를 노출 하 고는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 접근자 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you specify the tooltip as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> event is also raised when the tooltip closes.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명을 지정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed>이벤트도 도구 설명이 닫힐 때 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: To be added.

Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening> event that is exposed by objects that use the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"></xref> service to display tooltips.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>이벤트에 의해 노출 되는 사용 하는 개체는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"> </xref> 도구 설명을 표시 하려면 서비스.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening> event occurs immediately before a tooltip opens.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>이 이벤트는 도구 설명이 열리기 바로 전에 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur if the tooltip is not defined or if the tooltip content is set to null.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명을 정의 되지 않은 경우 또는 도구 설명 콘텐츠 설정 된 경우이 이벤트가 발생 하지 않는 null로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This field registers the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening> event for classes that use this service.
trans-unit.target: 동작을 등록 하는이 필드는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>이 서비스를 사용 하는 클래스에 대 한 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>클래스는 둘 다 구현는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>를 통해이 이벤트를 노출 하 고는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 접근자 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you specify the tooltip as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> event is also raised when the tooltip opens.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명을 지정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened>이벤트도 도구 설명이 열릴 때 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset*> attached property.
